name: HIA
overview:
HIA is a group of companies comprised of highly motivated, disciplined and trained teams consisting who strive to implement cutting edge solutions in the myriad fields of: Information Technology Food, Beverages and Confectioneries Media and Design Bamboo Furniture and Bamboo Homes Resorts and Homes Human Resources Learning, Education and Training

Our services touch every aspect of commercial and civilian domains.

We’re amongst the youngest and fastest growing corporate groups in India and business collaborations around the world.

Willingness to take on challenges and see them through is our hallmark because we know that challenges are the steps of the ladder that takes us higher and higher. When quality and trust are the benchmarks of a good working philosophy, very few companies can match the HIA Group.

Companies: http://hia.co.in/companies.html

Nonprofits: http://hia.co.in/nonprofits.html
